== Kadakkarappally (628210) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Kadakkarappally is a village in the [[Cherthala]] taluka of [[Alappuzha]] district with an area of 881 hectares and harbouring 5094 households with total population of 20487 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Cherthala]] is at a distance of 3 km. Male population is 10142 and female population is 10345. Scheduled Caste Population is 870 and Scheduled Tribes population is 53. Census Location Code of the village is 628210<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 18095 (88.32%)
* Literate male population: 9003 (88.77%)
* Literate female population: 9092 (87.89%)
